name: irresistibly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is impossible to refuse, oppose, or avoid because it is too pleasant, attractive, or strong: The cosmetics come in irresistibly cute packaging bursting with peaches and flowers. He is irresistibly drawn to cameras and lights.
More examplesFewer examplesThe show is irresistibly entertaining.Arnie was broad-shouldered, slim-hipped and irresistibly charming. His listeners were drawn in irresistibly.We are led irresistibly to the conclusion that these claims are false.
